segments.text: Hi , Ms . Seymour ? It ’ s Allan Parker . I ’ Ve been waiting to call you and thank you for all your help last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much , Mr . Parker . But , that is my job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want to let your boss know that she ’ d better hold on to you ! You ’ re a hard worker !
segments.speaker: S2
